div.p: Keep up to date with what's been happening here at Reflection as we work to build features and tools to help you succeed in the app market

article.p: Everyone here at Reflection is very excited that you have decided to join us. Our mission is to help you make smarter, faster decisions by using our accurate market data and reporting tools that we are building using your feedback.
article.figcaption: The development of new features being undertaken furiously at our London office.
article.p: You'll start to see the rollout of new features and tools as our beta progresses. Also you can keep track of what country and category will be available next here on the homepage.
As one of our partners, you can help accelerate our progress by spreading the word. If you know a developer who would be interested in joining us, please introduce them to me at gustaf@reflection.io.

Your feedback is essential as it helps us to shape the features that developers actually want. Please get in touch if you have any feature requests, recommendations or if you just want to share your thoughts, positive or negative. We look forward to hearing from you at beta@reflection.io
Finally, please remember that as we are still in beta you may occasionally encounter bugs, inaccuracies or slow performance as we fine-tune our system.

article.h2: Creating an iTunes Finance user account
article.p: When linking your account to our site (or any external website) we recommend you create a new iTunes Connect User that only has the specific permissions you intend to share. Our site will require permission to access your financial data.

article.h2: Finding your Vendor ID on iTunesConnect
article.p: Your iTunes username and password are what you use to log into iTunesConnect. Your Vendor ID is a little buried on iTunesConnect and the following guide will help you locate it.

div.p: You can keep tabs on upcoming features in this section and also monitor the expansion of our dataset. We are constantly working behind the scenes to integrate new data in order to improve accuracy.

In our latest update, we are opening up the Game category for the UK, Germany, France and Italy. We also have split data for iPhone and iPad, and are currently implementing a new model that accurately predicts numbers for the for top 5 apps.
We're currently working on our new graphs, which will be available in a future update so stay tuned.
Remember, as a partner you have free, unlimited access to all of Reflection's features for the duration of the private beta.
If you have any questions or suggestions for a feature you need please e-mail us at beta@reflection.io.
